thanks.title: To be continued...
thanks.description:
Thanks for visiting my portfolio. 
I hope you like it!

unq.title: Graduated!
unq.description: Graduated with a Bachelor degree in software development at National University of Quilmes.

scubalight.title: Senior Game Developer
scubalight.description: I've been working here since may 2024, on a Fall Guys-like multiplayer game, adding new gameplay features and creating the backend infrastructure.

globant.title: UI Game Developer
globant.description: Worked on Madden NFL as a UI Game developer. Implemented entirely screens that are used by millions of players

ratherlabs.title: Lead Game Dev
ratherlabs.description: Developed an WebGL NFT fighting game, including core gameplay mechanics, AI, characters creator engine, and multiplayer features.

agonalea.title: Lead Game Dev
agonalea.description: Led Rythm Realms team, a Google Indie Games Fund Award winning game team for 2 years. Created core rhythmic mechanics, lootboxes, inventory and season pass features.

cloodie.title: Full-stack Web Developer
cloodie.description: Full-stack first professional experience. Developed microservices with Node.Js, and front-end modules with Vue.Js for a telemedicine web app.

delivergames.title: Indie game dev
delivergames.description:
My first experience as a game dev.
Developed mobile games for small clients with Unity and Godot, some games has been published in Google Playstore and itch.io
